about_the_game:
In The Dream Observatory, you’ll play the role of the Dream Weaver, the one who creates and delivers perfect dreams to dreamers across the world every night.


Use logic and intuition to mix and match Concepts and Dream Cards to achieve the best possible oneiric experiences.




Getting to know each dreamer in depth is key to deciding which dream is best for them. Analyze their emotions, desires, and lived experiences, and make your choice!
You’ll also be able to impact their lives with the power of dreams, if you wish. But be careful! Delivering the wrong dream means insomnia for the dreamer and catastrophic consequences for the Observatory!


Once the nights are over, you’ll be free to explore the Observatory to obtain upgrades and supplies to boost your work. You’re also encouraged to investigate the dreams you’ve found and the dreamers you’ve met as you learn the hidden secrets of the Observatory.



Work hard night after night and uncover the mystery behind the Dream Observatory!




  • 10 base concepts
  • More than 150 dreams
  • Hundreds of possible combinations
  • Dynamic narrative with multiple possible endings
  • Unique blend of logic and resource-management
  • Cozy & Dreamlike style
  • Inspiring soundtrack

name: The Dream Observatory
short_description: Become the dream weaver in The Dream Observatory. Craft the perfect oniric journey for each dreamer by using and combining dream portal cards, tailoring each experience to their needs and emotions in this immersive cozy single-player cards management game.
